data.message: Comprehensive comparison study: V1 vs V2 vs Original glassmorphism design: Created detailed breakdown analyzing why V1 scored ~40% match (circles too visible, no vignette/sheen, wrong layout, oversaturated) vs V2 at ~85% match (giant off-canvas blobs, proper layering, correct glass formula). Documented: Environment Build technique, Glass Card formula, 5-layer Color Depth Hierarchy. Saved 3 learnings + 1 decision artifact.
data.task: Comprehensive comparison study: V1 vs V2 vs Original glassmorphism design
data.outcome: Created detailed breakdown analyzing why V1 scored ~40% match (circles too visible, no vignette/sheen, wrong layout, oversaturated) vs V2 at ~85% match (giant off-canvas blobs, proper layering, correct glass formula). Documented: Environment Build technique, Glass Card formula, 5-layer Color Depth Hierarchy. Saved 3 learnings + 1 decision artifact.
